text: Anyone have experiences with email providers with custom domain support? I'm on ProtonMail currently but would like to move to something that supports other email apps (PM requires a bridge app on desktop to do the encryption and locks you into their app on mobile). So far FastMail seems like a good alternative.

text: I've used FastMail for the last year and have been happy with it. It's incredibly boring, as all good email applications should be. I've never messed with the encryption settings, though, so I'm not sure how that part would compare to ProtonMail.
